plan(1,init, sentence(true,move(print,"button STARTS"),'','' ))
plan(2,init, sentence(true,move( switchplan(simualate) ),'','' ))
plan(1,simualate, sentence(true,delay( 1000) ,'','' ))
plan(2,simualate, sentence(true,move(print,"button emits"),'','' ))
plan(3,simualate, sentence(true,raise( local_click , clicked )'),'','' ))
plan(4,simualate, sentence(true,repeatplan(6) ,'','' ))
